title: Textile, "Trocadero", 1989
medium: Technique: Plain weave foundation. Screen printed with a combination of fibre reactive dyes and               mother-of-pearl colors.
inscribed: left selvedge: 12 registration circles for screens. right selvedge: "COLLECTION INTERIEUR", arrow, 100% BAUMWOLLE, care symbols and 12 registration circles.
dimensions:
Warp x Weft: 301 x 140 cm (9 ft. 10 1/2 in. x 55 1/8 in.)
Repeat H: 63.5 cm (25 in.)
description: Geometric arrangement of barred stripes and dotted areas. 12 screens. Purples, blues black and gold.

tombstone.epitaph:
Textile, "Trocadero", 1989.
1989. Technique: Plain weave foundation. Screen printed with a combination of fibre reactive dyes and               mother-of-pearl colors.. Gift of Heberlein Textildruck. 1990-132-1.
